page.title: 10Businesses in Ufton Village.
page.content: In the village of Ufton itself there are only three established businesses: 1.The Village Shop. 2.The White Hart Inn. 3.The Garage. The shop is a typical general store/ post office selling fruit and veg. confectionery; newspapers; tinned food etc.It is thought to be too small but there is no space for an extension. There is considerable passing trade. The Inn has no accomodation for guests although it is a food orientated pub which relies to a great extent on attracting customers from the surrounding towns.Local people support the pub with their custom.Traditional beer and home cooked meals are the main attraction. There is a small garage for car repair.
